title: Integrating the Best of Science & Nature.
description: Boise Functional Medicine, Holistic Medicine, & Integrative Medicine techniques can change the course of disease, aging, or functional decline. Whether it be IV therapy treatments, hormone replacement & more, Dr. Mary identifies natural holistic treatments for anti aging through natural medicine therapies in Boise.
